title: HomeAssistant.__init__ requires passing a string to it
description: The signature of HomeAssistant.init has been changed from no arguments to require the configuration directory as a string to be passed to it. Scripts, tests etc. outside of the HomeAssistant core repo which create HomeAssistant objects will need to be updated.
